thread.title: Blake Lively switches up style at New York Fashion Week | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Blake Lively switches up style at New York Fashion Week | Daily Mail Online

author: Stephanie Haney At Dailymail.Com
title: Blake Lively switches up style at New York Fashion Week | Daily Mail Online
text: Share She doubled up on the overcoat with a third layer featuring a houndstooth peacoat. Blake had the mod look down to a science with geometric earrings, round, wire-framed glasses and white, pointed-toe stilettos. So mod: The Cafe Society star wore a high-waisted mermaid skirt with white print and and all-black, ribbed top under a black-and-white, slanted checkered jacket with a fur neckline Robyn, her 45-year-old sister of Teen Witch fame, wore navy and white stripes under a solid black double-breasted peacoat, but opted to add a splash of color on foot with a blue, pink, yellow and white printed heel. Blake recently gushed about the Valentine's day gift she received from husband Ryan Reynolds. The 40-year-old actor bought his beloved a pair of Anita Ko rose-gold arrow earrings, which she showed off at her recent Galentine's Day party. Sister, sister: Robyn, her 45-year-old sister of Teen Witch fame, wore navy and white stripes under a solid black double-breasted peacoat, but opted to add a splash of color on foot Good husband: Blake recently gushed about the Anita Ko rose-gold arrow earrings she received from husband Ryan Reynolds for Valentine's Day During her girls day out, the Gossip Girl star showed off the earring to Elle magazine, saying: 'Well, this was my Valentine's Day gift, one of them, apparently.' She continued: 'But I love this because it's also like Valentine's Day, it's an arrow. The cupid got me very bad with him. I have it very, very bad for my husband, so it's a nice representation of that for me. That's why I loved it.' And just a few days later, she and her sister spent the early part of Wednesday taking in the latest looks by Michael Kors, who Blake says she owed 'everything in the fashion world,' according to Women's Wear Daily . Happy family! The Gossip Girl star and her Canadian-actor husband have two daughters together 'I had just started ['Gossip Girl'], and no one knew or cared [about it] at that point, and he brought me to a Vogue event,' she said of the designer. It was at that event where she met Anna Wintour, who later ended up putting the Savages star on the cover of her magazine three times. '[Anna] became a great friend and supporter of mine,' Blake said. 'So anytime [Kors] has a show and I'm in town, I'm there... I wouldn't be in this if it weren't for him.' Anna, 67, who serves as both Editor-in-Chief of Vogue and Creative Director of Conde Nast, joined the Lively sisters front row at the runway show, with both she and Blake in floral prints. Beautiful trio: Anna, 67, who serves as both Editor-in-Chief of Vogue and Creative Director of Conde Nast, joined the Lively sisters front row at the Michael Kors show earlier on Wednesday Read more:
